pageContext.claim: “The New York Times reporting is false. They are a true ENEMY OF THE PEOPLE!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump's definition of "fake news" is that it is negative, not that it accurately reflects what happened. People in the news business have a different definition of fake news -- things that did not happen. Reporters do make mistakes, but responsible news organizations correct them. There's no evidence that The New York Times is the "true enemy of the people."
